Package Model.Forum

Class Forum

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Forum.Forum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Forum
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Forum class containing all the information associated with the Forum section in the form of Thread ArrayList. Implements Serializable and has a field for the serial version.
    Version:
    1.0 - 19.05.21
    Author:
    Group 1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Forum()
      Zero argument constructor initializing the ArrayList containing Topic objects.

    • Constructor Detail

        public Forum()
        Zero argument constructor initializing the ArrayList containing Topic objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getTopicByTitle

        public Thread getTopicByTitle​(java.lang.String title)
        Retrieves Thread object based on the argument provided.
        Parameters:
        title - String of the desired Thread title
        Returns:
        Thread object found based on the title argument provided, if not found then a null value is returned

      • getTopicByIndex

        public Thread getTopicByIndex​(int index)
        Retrieves Thread object based on the index provided.
        Parameters:
        index - integer representing the index of desired Thread object within the ArrayList
        Returns:
        Thread object based on the index provided or a null value if there is nothing there

      • addCommentOnTopic

        public void addCommentOnTopic​(java.lang.String topicTitle,
                              java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.String user)
        Adds a comment to the specified thread.
        Parameters:
        topicTitle - String of the Thread title
        message - String of the comment that is to be added
        user - String of the user that posted the comment
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If one of the arguments is null = "Title, message and username cannot be null"

      • addTopic

        public void addTopic​(java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String description)
        Creates and adds a Thread object to the ArrayList based on given arguments.
        Parameters:
        title - String of the Thread title
        description - String of the Thread description
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If title or description is null = "Please provide a title and a description" or a topic with such title already exists = "Please provide a unique title"

      • removeTopic

        public void removeTopic​(java.lang.String topic)
        Removes Thread object from the ArrayList based on the argument provided.
        Parameters:
        topic - String of the Thread topic's title that should be removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Thread object with provided title was not found = "Thread not found"

      • getNumberOfTopics

        public int getNumberOfTopics()
        Returns the size of the ArrayList containing Threads.
        Returns:
        integer representing the size of the ArrayList
